Krish Ramoju

Occupation: Student at Chaitanya Bharati Institute of Technology

Location: Hyderabad, Telangana, India

About Me

First of extracurricular activities. I was vice captain in 8th grade followed by 9th and 10th. I have a bronze level International Award for Young People (IAYP) certificate. I have participated in 8 Model United Nations, winning Outstanding Delegate twice in Sancta Maria's Model United Nations and have also participated in Harvard Online Model United Nations among others.

Regarding my academic achievements, I was the Salutatorian of my batch at Sancta Maria. I have followed the Cambridge curriculum throughout my student life, part of it at International British School of Alexandria in Egypt. I have excelled in both IGCSE and A-Level exams. I achieved a 98.14 percentile in JEE Mains and I would like to highlight the shortage of students from a Cambridge background pursuing this entrance examination. Currently, I am a Computer Science core engineering student at Chaitanya Bharati Institute of Technology.

I have demonstrated success as a learner both academically and otherwise.
